ValidationRule.description: Shared login users must verify Team Member on edit
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ($Profile.Name = 'Transitions Team' || $Profile.Name = 'Compliance' || $Profile.Name = 'Compliance Manager' || $Profile.Name = 'Operations' || $Profile.Name = 'Operations Manager' || $Profile.Name = 'Payroll Team' || $Profile.Name = 'Distributions' || $Profile.Name = 'Billing User' ) && ( OwnerId = '00500000006xUkf' || OwnerId = '00537000001tb5H' || OwnerId = '00537000002SL2S' || OwnerId = '00537000002STLD' || OwnerId = '005370000039BHY' || OwnerId = '00500000006yEak' ) && ISBLANK(TEXT( Team_Member__c ))
